current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To prohibit a reduction in funding for the defense commissary system in fiscal year 2015 pending
			 the report of the Military Compensation and Retirement Modernization
			 Commission.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

for the defense commissary system during fiscal year
			 2015 may not be reduced below the average monthly amount of funds made

			 Commission
